nodes.text: The Best Defense is an article written by Morrie Mullins as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on March 10, 2005 and took the form of a short story believed to have been written by Osten Dal'Nay detailing a character named Nightwing who was a member of the Navy of Thaere. Nightwing was cleaning his rifle when the Nikto commander Kulkis entered his barracks. After a terse conversation, the Nikto attacked Nightwing with a knife but in the ensuing scuffle, the Nikto himself was stabbed and killed.
